short_summary: Miscellaneous grocery products for CSC. Specification: UNSPSC Categories, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
description: For the delivery of miscellaneous grocery products for CSC Housing Units in Quebec, Canada, Specification UNSPSC codes, Submissions: Bid Files
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**

**Title:** Miscellaneous Grocery Products for Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Housing Units

**Reference:** WS3697278636-Doc3921129417
**Solicitation Number:** WS3697278636

**Publication Date:** March 17, 2023
**Closing Date:** April 17, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Background:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for the supply and delivery of miscellaneous grocery products for CSC’s Housing Units located in the province of Quebec, Canada. The procurement will be under a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) basis.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of this RFSO includes the supply and delivery of various grocery products, such as nuts and seeds, minimally processed meat and poultry products, fish, eggs and egg substitutes, milk and butter products, cheese, and other related items, as outlined in the Solicitation Documents.

**Regions of Delivery:**
The products will be delivered to the following locations:

* Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines
* Laval
* Cowansville

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Notice Type:** RFSO

**Selection Criteria:** The bid will be selected based on the Lowest Price.

**Trade Agreements:** This bid is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Other agreements as listed in the Solicitation Documents

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Andy Doucette, Procurement Officer, at andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15722749?extsite=MTU3MjI3NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== The complete Solicitation Documents are available on the Government of Canada’s Tendering Authority website.

**Closing Time:** Bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on April 17, 2023. The contract will be awarded based on the Lowest Price. The bidder
